extension.print.title: Print
extension.browse.title: Browse for stylesheets
print.announcePortAcquisition.descriptio: Tell me what port the embedded web server acquires
print.renderMarkdown.description: Render markdown as HTML when printing
print.browserPath.description: Path to the executable of an alternate browser
print.colourScheme.description: Press `F1` then `Print: Browse for stylesheet` to choose a highlightjs compatible stylesheet. If you choose a file outside the stylesheet cache it will be copied to the cache. Paper is white so choose light themes for dark text.
print.printAndClose.description: Show the Print dialog when the browser is ready, and try to close the page after printing is done or cancelled
print.editorContextMenuPosition.descript: The position of `Print` in the editor context menu
print.dynamicPortMax.description: End of the range in which a free port will be sought
Start of the range in which a free port will be sought
